text: I'd like you to tell me all the things you see going on in the picture. Okay, the water is running out of the sink, overflowing. The mother is doing the dishes. The boy is falling off the stool, stealing the cookies out of the cookie jar. The young lady is holding her hand up ready to receive one of the cookies. There is a cup and a saucer on the sink board. and uh... There's the video.
